snippet.title: Pushover - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Pushover is a puzzle game. It was made by Red Rat Software and was published by Ocean Software in 1992.

Uhmm, I would say this game is self explanatory :D

This game is actually an Amiga game, but this version is a remake and was ported to modern systems by IshiSoft. You can download the game here:

http://ishisoft.com/archives/126

It is like Domino Day of some sort. The goal in every level is to make every single block fall in one push. There is a block with 3 red stripes on it. That one has to fall last, if it doesn't you fail the level. 

The interesting thing about this puzzle game is that you don't just push a block and everything falls because it is in a row. There are blocks which can actually bounce off other blocks, or split into 2 blocks which go left and right at the same time, or even blocks that fly up and knock over blocks in a higher area.

Just watch the video and you will understand, its pretty cool ;)
